nodes.text: Ulic Qel-Droma's mesh suit was a suit of medium armor that was utilized by the fallen Jedi Knight Ulic Qel-Droma during the Great Sith War. Qel-Droma abandoned his armor, as well as all his trappings of the dark side after the murder of his brother, Cay. Even so, the dark taint continued to haunt it, with the possibility of affecting whomever wore it.
